Google Maps API

Next JS app. Google Maps API implemented with Redux for state storage. Include LoadScript, Marker and AutoComplete (Search Box) methods, all saved by Redux.

GPT-2 AI

Next JS app. GPT-2 Artificial Intelligence implementation. DeepAI API Text-Generator Model. Inputs saved with Redux.

DeepAI NFT

Next JS app. Own crypto NFT generator with some DeepAI Artificial Intelligence implementation for image generating. You'll need a wallet, Metamask recomended.
